resources.string: Baap of Rolls that started as a joint venture a few years back has now become a renowned name for the foodies of Delhi and other cities. Having outlets in Delhi, Noida, Gurgaon, Ghaziabad, Meerut Roorkee, Baap of Rolls is serving some extravagant Kathi rolls. Founded in 2020 by an experienced entrepreneur and food enthusiast who has more than 12 years of experience with national and International FB Outlets, Baap of Rolls is redefining the most loved street food of all times. The company was started with a motive to deliver the best-packed rolls all across India."
